DOC.brief_summary: Inflammation may play a role in the development of polycystic ovary syndrome (PCOS). In this study, the investigators investigated the expression of different mediators of inflammation in fatty tissue and in blood in women with and without PCOS.
DOC.criteria: Women with PCOS were included according to the Rotterdam diagnostic criteria for PCOS. Control women met none of the criteria for PCOS OcÂ´s within the last three months, or other medication known to alter glucose/insulin metabolism Other known chronic diseases
DOC.keyword: The independent effect of PCOS and obesity on adipose expression and plasma levels of adipocytokines
